channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump Jr. and Bettina Anderson Reveal They're Engaged at the White House in Announcement from Donald Trump
item.description: "I'm not usually at a loss for words, because I'm usually doing the ranting and raving really well," Donald Jr. said during the announcement

item.title: Influencer McKenna Barry Announces Pregnancy Loss After 6½ Years of Trying to Conceive: 'The Hole You Left Is Infinite'

item.title: Jason Kelce Advises Brother Travis Kelce to ‘Step Away from the Game’ While He Considers NFL Retirement
item.description: The Philadelphia Eagles star retired from the NFL in March 2024 after 13 seasons with the team

item.title: Rob Reiner, Wife Michele 'Tried Everything' to Help Son Nick Before They Died in 'Nightmare' Murder (Exclusive Sources)

item.title: Michelle Obama Says She and Barack Were Supposed to See Rob and Michele Reiner on the Day They Died
item.description: The former first lady called the late couple "some of the most decent and courageous people"
